title: Ready or not
creator_credit: Myles-Milwright Productions, Dianne Milwright, Dom Clausen and Pamela Eagles
brief_description: As all children are different and develop at different rates it is not easy to identify school readiness. This program assists in identifying this stage by showing aspects of school life that children will encounter. Discusses how early experiences in the family and at preschool develop physical, social and intellectual maturity.
